Class ConfigValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.tours.polytech.DI.RFID.objects.ConfigValue

  • public class ConfigValue
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a value in the configuration file.
    Author:
    COLEAU Victor, COUCHOUD Thomas
